# The Emaciated Entities {.unnumbered}

## Contents {.unnumbered}

This book covers the six Emaciated Entities and is compatible with the [MÖRK BORG TTRPG](https://morkborg.com/).

It includes:

- Descriptions of the six Emaciated Entities.
- An optional player class for each Entity.
- Powers from the Entities.
- Creatures for each Entity.
